auction.add.project.member: We will notify the author of the project by email that you have created an auction to help raise funds.
auction.add.submit.text: Once you submit your auction, it will be pending approval by the esolidar team. Only then will it become visible within the esolidar's Community.
auction.add.subtitle: Auctions are an easy way to raise funds
auction.beneficiary.help: Select the beneficiary that this auction will support.
auction.description.info: Describe information about the prize, goals, and motivation behind this auction.
auction.description.payment.help: Explain how the payment will be made once the buyer wins the prize.
auction.description.payment.placeholder: e.g. Payment must be made by bank transfer within 48 hours. We will send you the bank details after the buyer wins the prize.
auction.description.shipping.help: Describe information about shipping costs, handling, and other exceptions.
auction.description.shipping.placeholder: e.g. Import duties, taxes, and other shipping expenses are not included. The prize will be sent from Brazil.
auction.detail.commingSoonAuction: We're sorry, but you can only bid when the auction starts.
auction.detail.error.startBidInvalid: Please enter a value between {bidStart} and {maxBid}.
auction.detail.infoBid: Any bid made in the last 2 minutes of the auction will automatically reset the auction timer to 2 minutes remaining.
auction.edit.forbidden: You can not edit an Active auction
auction.esolidar.no.tax.info: This auction is not liable to esolidar taxes.
auction.esolidar.tax.info: Esolidar will deduct {tax}% from the winning bid. This small percentage will help us keep the platform up and running.
auction.modal.bid.check1: Esolidar and the beneficiary for which it is intended the amount raised in this auction, we reserve the legal right to take legal action against any act that puts into question the normal operation of it.
auction.modal.bid.check3: To be able to bid, you must first accept to receive our notifications. This will allow us to inform you whenever you win an auction.
auction.modal.bid.email: If you are the winner, you will receive an email to:
auction.modal.subscribe.check1: Send me an email when the auction starts.
auction.modal.subscribe.check2: Send me an email when someone makes the first bid.
auction.modal.subscribe.check3: Send me an email 24 hours before the auction ends.
auction.tags.help: Include tags that will help the buyer find the auction.
auction.tags.info: Use comma, space, or enter to add a new tag.
auctions.add.answer0: The auction may also appear on the esolidar.com community website. To do this, choose the Yes option in the Show field on esolidar.com. If you activate this feature, the auction will be pending approval by the esolidar team. Once the auction is approved, you will receive a notification/email.
auctions.add.answer1: Include tags that buyers would use to search for your item.
auctions.add.answer2: Select one image each time. The maximum size is 5Mb

ods-1-description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
ods-2-description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
ods-3-description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
ods-4-description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
ods-5-description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
ods-6-description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
ods-7-description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
ods-8-description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
ods-9-description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
ods-10-description: Reduce inequality within and among countries
ods-11-description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
ods-12-description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
ods-13-description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
ods-14-description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
ods-15-description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
ods-16-description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
ods-17-description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
